name: SevereCombinedImmunodeficiency
title: Severe Combined Immunodeficiency
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent diagnoses that indicate a severe combined immunodeficiency including both genetic and other causes.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with diagnoses that indicate the presence of a severe combined immunodeficiency including genetic conditions.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
